thread.section_title: Hotel Palladium Palace - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Rome, Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Best hotel, best area, best service!
thread.title_full: Best hotel, best area, best service! - Review of Hotel Palladium Palace, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: Sergio S
title: Best hotel, best area, best service!
text: Our hotel was conveniently located to the Roma Termini, which helped us reach other destinations with ease. The staff was courteous and useful. I enjoyed that there was a safe in the room and that the room was clean and cozy. Great place to use while in Rome.
